examples.0006_cookies.l2:
POST 
https://httpbin.org/post

# HEADERS
Cookie:"sessionid=foo;another-cookie=bar"

Header1:value1
Header2: Value2

# DATA
hello=world
examples.0005_headers_simple.l2:
POST 
https://httpbin.org/post

# HEADERS
X-Parse-Application-Id:'helloworld'
X-Parse-REST-API-Key:"byeworld"

# DATA
a="b"  # double-quoted string
'c'=d  # single-quoted & unquoted strings

0007_multipart_file.0007_multipart_file.l2:
POST
MULTIPART
http://httpbin.org/post

'X-Parse-Application-Id':helloworld 
X-Parse-REST-API-Key:"helloworld"

# DATA
first=second

# FILES
myfile@./image.jpeg

examples.0003_comment.l2:
# Pound symbol signifies a comment
POST
https://httpbin.org/post

a=b # Comments may start at the end of lines as well
c=d

# Comments work even after the payload

0009_processor_basic.0009_processor_basic.l2:
url = "http://google.com"
---
# stage 1

POST
${REMOTE_COORD}/anything

{
    "username": "admin",
    "password": "Password@123",
    "from": "${LOCAL_COORD}/anything",
    "url": "${url}",
    "Token": "MySuperSecretToken"
}

---

// filtering, store in var
console.log("@@Result", result)
let TOKEN = result["json"]["Token"]
console.log(TOKEN)

---

# stage 2
GET
${REMOTE_COORD}/bearer

Authorization: 'Bearer ${TOKEN}'

{}
